admin.add_items_private_data: â„¹ï¸ Please send the data that the user will receive after purchase. Note: If you enter one line, you will add one product, if you enter multiple lines, you will add multiple products. 1 line=1 item 10 rows=10 items. If you want to abort adding items enter "cancel".

ğŸ“„ Send .txt file with new items or type "cancel" for cancel. File content example: 
Tea|Green|Tea Widow;50.0;Description;private_data_here

Legacy format also supported: 
CATEGORY#1;SUBCATEGORY#1;DESCRIPTION#1;50.0;PRIVATE_DATA#1

user.faq_string: âš ï¸ In our store ignorance of the rules does not exempt you from responsibility. Buying at least one product in the store you automatically agree with all the rules of the store! Rules of the store â—1.In case of inadequate/offensive behavior the seller has the right to refuse the service! â—2.A replacement is provided only if the product is invalid. â—3.Replacement is provided only if there is a video proof. â—4.30 minutes warranty period. â—5.The administration is not responsible for any unlawful actions performed by the buyer with the items purchased in the store. â—6.These terms and conditions may change at any time. â—7.Money cannot be withdrawn from your balance.
